name: Captain
rulesNotAbility: When play reaches the Captain, reveal another greed card.
title: The Captain

name: GreedHate
title: Captain Freaks Out!
rules: The game ends. Someone Gets Shot!

name: GreedKill
title: Captain Shoots wildly!
rules: The game ends. The top 2 in each category Get Shot!

name: GreedApathy
title: Loading the Gun!
rules: The game ends after one more round. Someone Gets Shot!

name: GreedGifts
title: Captain gives gifts.
rules: The game ends. Coins are worth double.

name: GreedCranky
title: Captain gets cranky!
rules: The game ends. The player(s) with the most treasure lose 2 treasure each.

name: behavior.Bribe
title: Bribe
rule1of3: : Gain an item.

name: behavior.Deceive
title: Deceive
rule1of3: : Swap a treasure.

name: behavior.Gripe
title: Gripe
rule1of3: : Swap an item with a player.

name: behavior.Hoodwink
title: Hoodwink
rule1of3: : Gain a treasure from the Captain's Greed.
rule2of3: : Gain 2 treasures from the Captain's Greed.
rule3of3: : Gain 3 treasures from the Captain's Greed.

name: behavior.Investigate
title: Investigate
rule1of3: : look at the bottom card of the Greed deck.
rule2of3: : look at the bottom 2 cards of the Greed deck.
rule3of3: : look at the bottom 3 cards of the Greed deck.

name: behavior.Jeer
title: Jeer
rule1of3: : Add a treasure from the Captain's loot to the Captain's Greed.
rule2of3: : Add 2 treasures from the Captain's loot to the Captain's Greed.
rule3of3: : Add 3 treasures from the Captain's loot to the Captain's Greed.

name: behavior.Kowtow
title: Kowtow
rule1of3: : Add a treasure from a player's loot to the Captain's Greed.
rule2of3: : Add 2 treasures from a player's loot to the Captain's Greed.
rule3of3: : Add 3 treasures from a player's loot to the Captain's Greed.

name: behavior.Lie
title: Lie
rule1of3: : Add or Remove a Captain cube then take another turn.
rule2of3: : Add or remove 2 Captain cubes then take another turn.
rule3of3: : Add or remove 3 Captain cubes then take another turn.

name: behavior.Menace
title: Menace
rule1of3: : Take an item from a player.

name: behavior.Negotiate
title: Negotiate
rule1of3: : Choose a player. Trade a treasure with that player.
rule2of3: : Choose a player. Trade 2 treasures with that player.
rule3of3: : Choose a player. Trade 3 treasures with that player.

name: behavior.Orate
title: Orate
rule1of3: : Add a treasure from the Captain's Greed to the Captain's loot.
rule2of3: : Add 2 treasures from the Captain's Greed to the Captain's loot.
rule3of3: : Add 3 treasures from the Captain's Greed to the Captain's loot.

name: behavior.Pout.png
title: Pout
rule1of3: : Bury a treasure.

name: behavior.Quibble
title: Quibble
rule1of3: : Swap a treasure with 1 in the Captain's Greed.
rule2of3: : Swap 2 treasures with 2 in the Captain's Greed.
rule3of3: : Swap 3 treasures with 3 in the Captain's Greed.

name: behavior.Steal
title: Steal
rule1of3: Take 2
from a player.

name: behavior.Trick
title: Trick
rule1of3: Give a player 1
: take an item from them.

name: behavior.Vomit
title: Vomit
rule1of3: : Bury a treasure.

name: behavior.Whine
title: Whine
rule1of3: , Add a treasure from your loot to the Captain's Greed.
rule2of3: , Add 2 treasures from your loot to the Captain's Greed.
rule3of3: , Add 3 treasures from your loot to the Captain's Greed.

name: behavior.Yell
title: Yell
rule1of3: : reveal the next behavior card. Take another turn.
rule2of3: : reveal the next 2 behavior cards. Take another turn.
rule3of3: : reveal the next 3 behavior cards. Take another turn.
